name: Wildwood Botanics
description: A haven of wild textures and natural forms. We specialize in locally sourced, seasonal blooms that bring the outdoors in. Founded in 2018, Wildwood Botanics has become a staple for those seeking an untamed aesthetic.
address: 42 Neal St, Covent Garden, London WC2H 9PR

reviews.comment: Absolutely stunning arrangements. The meadow mix lasted over a week!
Great service, though a bit pricey. Worth it for special occasions.

name: The Petal Studio
description: High-end floral design studio creating bespoke arrangements for luxury events and discerning homes. Known for our opulent style and premium flower selection.

reviews.comment: The peonies were breathtaking. Best florist in the city.
Ordered for my anniversary and my wife was blown away.

name: Blooms & Brews
description: Coffee shop by day, florist by... well, also by day. Grab a latte and a posy on your way to work. We focus on affordable, everyday cheer.
address: 88 Grays Inn Rd, Holborn, London WC1X 8AA

reviews.comment: Love the concept. Coffee is great and flowers are cute.
My go-to spot for small gifts.

name: Rose & Rye
description: Classic elegance meets modern sensibilities. Rose & Rye is dedicated to the timeless beauty of the rose, sourced from ethical growers.

reviews.comment: The red roses were velvet perfection.
Delivery was on time and presentation was lovely.

name: Urban Jungle
description: Transform your space with our curated selection of houseplants and terrariums. We believe every home needs a touch of green.

reviews.comment: My monstera is thriving! Great advice from the staff.
Cool selection, but pots are a bit expensive.

name: Grace & Garden
description: Award-winning floral design for weddings and grand occasions. Grace & Garden brings fairytales to life with flowers.

reviews.comment: They did my wedding and it was magical. Highly recommend!
